original_title: Shalom Sesame - Chanukah: The Missing Menorah
overview: It's time to celebrate Chanukah in Israel! Grover is bringing the latkes and all is well until Anneliese gets caught in a game of tag with a chicken and loses her special menorah... Can her friends find the missing menorah in time to celebrate Chanukah?
title: Shalom Sesame - Chanukah: The Missing Menorah
